mapper.update: update technology.platform_application set p_name = #{pName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p_category = #{pCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p_grade = #{pGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_Id = #{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where p_Id = #{pId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select p_Id, p_name, p_category, p_grade, c_Id, status from technology.platform_application
